$comment: This is a top-level database object
title: Bibliographic Reference

___lastName.description: The last name(s) of this author

___firstName.description: The first name(s) of this author
___firstName.title: First Name

___link.description: A link to a web page where this publication may be viewed or downloaded
___link.title: Link

___year.description: The year this item was published. Use a positive integer for AD / ACE, and a negative integer for BC / BCE.
___year.title: Year

___type.description: The type of object. Must be set to `BibliographicReference`.
___type.title: Type

___authors.description: An array of authors for this Reference
___authors.title: Authors

___lastName.description: The last name(s) of this author

items.description: A Person object representing an editor
items.title: Editor

___publisher.description: The name of the publisher of this reference, or the institution where it was published
___publisher.title: Publisher (or Institution)

___series.description: The series in which this publication was published
___series.title: Series

___edition.description: The edition of this Reference, formatted as an integer
___edition.title: Edition

___url.description: A URL for the JSON data for this Reference
___url.title: JSON URL

$eref.description: A human-readable abbreviation, containing on letters `a-z`, `A-Z`, and numbers `0-9` (no spaces allowed).
$eref.title: Abbreviation

___citationKey.description: A citation key which must be a valid Abbreviation. This field can be used by bibliographic reference management software like Mendeley or Zotero to store the citation key for a reference.
___citationKey.title: Citation Key

___volume.description: The volume number for this publication
___volume.title: Volume

___pages.description: The page numbers of this Reference
___pages.title: Pages

___publication.description: The publication where this item was published
___publication.title: Publication

___translators.description: An array of translators for this Reference
___translators.title: Translators

___lastName.description: The last name(s) of this author
___lastName.title: Last Name

___firstName.description: The first name(s) of this author
___firstName.title: First Name

items.description: A Person object representing a translator
items.title: Translator (Person)

___doi.description: The Digtial Object Identifier (DOI) for this publication. This should be just the DOI itself, not a URL, and should not include the `doi:` prefix (e.g. `10.1075/cal.20.02hie` not `https://doi.org/10.1075/cal.20.02hie` or `doi:10.1075/cal.20.02hie`).
___doi.title: Digital Object Identifier (DOI)

___id.description: A unique database identifier for this Reference
___id.title: ID

___city.description: The city in which this reference was published
